content: a very pretty pattern using the popcorn all my designs are offered for free if you see my patterns being sold please email me or message me here i am self taught and i am proud of all my designs i understand that my style of writing may not be the same as another designer i have not had my designs published if i were to get them published i would write them as per a more professional way of writing with that said i am always here to help but please do not send me rude messages do not call me unprofessional because i do not write my patterns in your style or that of another designer please read my patterns from beginning to end most of what you need to know will either be in the beginning with the notes section or with the round/row itself personal use/print only no pattern reproductions selling or copying allowed size depends on your hook yarn & gauge contact me at bluedragonflymom@gmail com
